I rejoice, am glad; also a salutation: Hail.
a sound, noise, voice, language, dialect.
large, great, in the widest sense.

37.brief: all, the whole, every kind of
37.long: all, the whole, every kind of.
I see, look upon, experience, perceive, discern, beware.
(a) physical power, force, might, ability, efficacy, energy, meaning (b) plur: powerful deeds, deeds showing (physical) power, marvelous works.

38.long: (denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
(lit: I speak well of) I bless; pass: I am blessed.
a king, ruler, but in some passages clearly to be translated: emperor.
heaven, (a) the visible heavens: the atmosphere, the sky, the starry heavens, (b) the spiritual heavens.
peace, peace of mind; invocation of peace a common Jewish farewell, in the Hebraistic sense of the health (welfare) of an individual.
honor, renown; glory, an especially divine quality, the unspoken manifestation of God, splendor.

39.long: any one, some one, a certain one or thing.
a Pharisee, one of the Jewish sect so called.
a crowd, mob, the common people.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

39.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
39.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
(a) I rebuke, chide, admonish, (b) I warn.

40.long: I answer, reply, take up the conversation.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
I keep silence, am silent, either voluntarily or involuntarily.
a stone; met: of Jesus as the chief stone in a building.

41.brief: as, like as, how, while, so that
41.long: as, like as, about, as it were, according as, how, when, while, as soon as, so that.
trans: I bring near; intrans: I come near, approach.
I see, look upon, experience, perceive, discern, beware.
a city, the inhabitants of a city.
I weep, weep for, mourn, lament.

41.brief: on, to, against, on the basis of, at
41.long: on, to, against, on the basis of, at.

41.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
41.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.

42.long: (denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
that, since, because; may introduce direct discourse.

42.brief: I come to know, learn, realize
42.long: I am taking in knowledge, come to know, learn; aor: I ascertained, realized.
a day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
peace, peace of mind; invocation of peace a common Jewish farewell, in the Hebraistic sense of the health (welfare) of an individual.
adv. (a) of time: just now, even now; just at hand, immediately, (b) of logical connection: now then, (c) in commands and appeals: at this instant.

42.brief: but, on the other hand, and
42.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
the eye; fig: the mind's eye.

43.long: that, since, because; may introduce direct discourse.
I have come, am present, have arrived.
a day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

43.brief: on, to, against, on the basis of, at
43.long: on, to, against, on the basis of, at.

43.brief: I press together, confine, compel, am afflicted with
43.long: (a) I press together, close, (b) I press on every side, confine, (c) I hold fast, (d) I urge, impel, (e) pass: I am afflicted with (sickness).
from all sides, on all sides.

44.long: I dash to the ground, level with the ground.

44.brief: I send away, release, remit, forgive, permit
44.long: (a) I send away, (b) I let go, release, permit to depart, (c) I remit, forgive, (d) I permit, suffer.
a stone; met: of Jesus as the chief stone in a building.

44.brief: on, to, against, on the basis of, at
44.long: on, to, against, on the basis of, at.
a stone; met: of Jesus as the chief stone in a building.
(a) instead of, in return for, over against, opposite, in exchange for, as a substitute for, (b) on my behalf, (c) wherefore, because.

44.brief: I come to know, learn, realize
44.long: I am taking in knowledge, come to know, learn; aor: I ascertained, realized.
fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time.

45.brief: I go in, come in, enter
45.long: I go in, come in, enter.
into, in, unto, to, upon, towards, for, among.
a temple, either the whole building, or specifically the outer courts, open to worshippers.

45.brief: I throw, cast, put out, banish, bring forth, produce
45.long: I throw (cast, put) out; I banish; I bring forth, produce.

46.long: (denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

46.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
46.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
I write; pass: it is written, it stands written (in the scriptures).
(a) a house, the material building, (b) a household, family, lineage, nation.
(a) a house, the material building, (b) a household, family, lineage, nation.
(a) prayer (to God), (b) a place for prayer (used by Jews, perhaps where there was no synagogue).

46.brief: but, on the other hand, and
46.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.

46.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
46.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause.

47.brief: down from, against, according to, throughout, during
47.long: gen: against, down from, throughout, by; acc: over against, among, daily, day-by-day, each day, according to, by way of.
a day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
a temple, either the whole building, or specifically the outer courts, open to worshippers.

47.brief: but, on the other hand, and
47.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.

47.brief: a scribe, town-clerk, man of learning
47.long: (a) in Jerusalem, a scribe, one learned in the Jewish Law, a religious teacher, (b) at Ephesus, the town-clerk, the secretary of the city, (c) a man of learning generally.
I seek, search for, desire, require, demand.

47.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
47.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
(a) I kill, destroy, (b) I lose, mid: I am perishing (the resultant death being viewed as certain).
(a) a people, characteristically of God's chosen people, first the Jews, then the Christians, (b) sometimes, but rarely, the people, the crowd.

48.long: I find, learn, discover, especially after searching.
(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause.
(a) a people, characteristically of God's chosen people, first the Jews, then the Christians, (b) sometimes, but rarely, the people, the crowd.
I hang out, mid: I hang upon.

48.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
48.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
I hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported.
